name: FightHoax
goal:
Unlike information found in newspapers or television broadcasts, information available on the Internet is not checked for quality or accuracy; therefore, it is particularly important for the individual Internet user to evaluate the source of information. Keep in mind that almost anyone can publish anything they wish on the Web. Techcrunch reports that 82% of the surveyed students canâ€™t tell the difference between fake news and real news.

Misinformation in the news hits all-time high records!

Our mission is to give everyone a powerful, yet simple tool so anyone in this world can fact-check any news article on the web, by themselves, in seconds.
interests: Competition, Development, Education, External Relations, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: None yet but we are aiming to participate in the Fake News Squad initiative by the European Commision.
